title: Immersive Learning Design for Virtual World-Based Mathematical Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Provides immersive learning experiences through math problem-solving and collaborative activities in a virtual world platform.

learning_goals: Solve at least three types of geometric problems using 3D spatial coordinate systems in a virtual world environment.
Complete a statistical data visualization project through real-time collaboration using immersive learning tools.
Search for and utilize at least five types of mathematics-related resources within a digital library system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
